# Wist — Smart Wishlist & Price Tracker (Full Documentation)

> Wist is a free smart wishlist and price tracking application. Save products from any online store, track price changes automatically, get price drop notifications, and share wishlists with friends.

## Overview

Wist solves the problem of managing online shopping across multiple stores. Instead of scattered bookmarks, screenshots, or notes, Wist provides a single dashboard to save, organize, and track products from any website.

### Core Value Propositions

1. **One place for all your wishlists**: No more scattered bookmarks. Save from Amazon, Target, Walmart, Etsy, or any store.
2. **Never overpay again**: Automatic daily price checks with a price history graph show you the best time to buy.
3. **Get alerted, not distracted**: Price drop notifications come to you — no need to constantly check prices manually.
4. **Share easily**: Generate a public link to your wishlist for birthdays, holidays, or gift registries.
5. **Works everywhere**: Chrome extension for instant one-click saving from any product page.

## Features in Detail

### Universal Wishlist
- Save products from any online store with a URL
- Chrome extension enables one-click saving while browsing
- Automatic extraction of product title, image, and price
- Works on Amazon, Target, Walmart, Best Buy, Etsy, eBay, Nike, ASOS, Nordstrom, Sephora, Apple, IKEA, Wayfair, and thousands more

### Automatic Price Tracking
- Daily automated price checks on all saved items
- Full price history chart for every item
- Visual indicators showing price increases and decreases
- Tracks percentage changes over time

### Price Drop Notifications
- Instant alerts when prices drop on your saved items
- Browser notifications via the Chrome extension
- Never miss a sale or deal on items you're watching

### Smart Collections
- Organize items into custom collections (e.g., "Holiday Gifts", "Home Office", "Clothing")
- Auto-categorization using AI to sort items into relevant collections
- Custom collection icons and colors

### Shareable Wishlists
- Generate a public link to share your wishlist
- Perfect for gift registries, birthdays, holidays, weddings
- Recipients can see all items with images and prices
- No account required to view shared wishlists

### Chrome Extension
- One-click product saving from any webpage
- Automatic price and image extraction
- Works on product pages across all online stores
- Syncs with your Wist dashboard in real-time

## Getting Started

1. Visit https://wishlist.nuvio.cloud
2. Create a free account (Google sign-in or email)
3. Install the Chrome extension from the extension page
4. Start saving products and tracking prices

## Pricing

Wist is free to use. Core features including the wishlist, price tracking, price drop notifications, Chrome extension, and shareable wishlists are all included at no cost.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is Wist free?**
A: Yes, Wist is completely free to use. All core features are included.

**Q: What stores does Wist work with?**
A: Wist works with any online store that has product pages. This includes Amazon, Target, Walmart, Best Buy, Etsy, eBay, Nike, ASOS, Nordstrom, and thousands more.

**Q: How does price tracking work?**
A: Wist automatically checks prices daily for all your saved items. You can see the full price history on each item's detail page.

**Q: Can I share my wishlist?**
A: Yes! You can generate a shareable public link to your wishlist that anyone can view without creating an account.

**Q: Do I need the Chrome extension?**
A: The Chrome extension makes saving products much easier (one click), but you can also paste product URLs directly in the dashboard.

**Q: Is my data private?**
A: Yes. Your wishlist is private by default. You choose when and what to share via public links.
